segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen, showing the right wall with the sink.

segments.text: The adult is focused on her task, polishing that plate diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is blank, unaware of the water pouring over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing in a sheet, soaking the cabinets and pooling on the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands right in it, one foot submerged, yet continues as if nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above frames a pretty garden scene, all tidy and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, letting in light on this domestic mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the cookie jar sits temptingly in the open upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on the wobbly stool, grabbing cookies with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, like he's trying to be careful, but the stool tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up beside him, her face full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating in secret, away from the woman's notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end badly with slips or falls on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon to stop this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between outside calm and inside peril is striking.
